# Documentation Standard

> **Note**  
> Much of the information in the API Reference section is available from within the e² studio tool via the [Developer Assistance](https://example.com/developer-assistance) feature.  
> The information here can be referenced for additional details on API features.

---

## Key Points

- **Bold text** dùng để nhấn mạnh  
- *Italic text* dùng để làm nổi bật nhẹ  
- [Link tham khảo](https://example.com) để dẫn người đọc đến nguồn ngoài  

---

## Example Code

```c
#include <stdio.h>

int main() {
    printf("Hello, Zephyr RTOS!\n");
    return 0;
}
```
